result.name: Twitch Dark Theme Enhancer
result.description: Modifies the current Twitch.tv dark theme to resemble its older dark theme.
result.notes: Style Settings Top Navigation Menu: Choose between Purple or the Default grey colour. Smooth Chat Scrolling: Smooth scrolling effect with new chat room messages. Channel Info Background Colour: Select the colour used for the channel information bar below the video. Couch Mode: Press F11 to view stream and chat in full screen. Hide Footer: Hides Sign Up message when not logged in. Live Time Format (Experimental): Remove the seconds displayed from live time view. Note: Due to limitations this may not function as expected on all systems.
